remarks: A condition equivalent to the modular pair property.  Part of proof of Theorem 1.14 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 4.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdcompl.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdcompl.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdcompli $p |- ( A MH B <-> ( A i^i ( _|_ ` ( A i^i B ) ) ) MH ( B i^i ( _|_ ` ( A i^i B ) ) ) ) $.
